boost/python/eigen/squeeze_matrix.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_PYTHON_EIGEN_SQUEEZE_MATRIX_HPP_INCLUDED
00002 #define BOOST_PYTHON_EIGEN_SQUEEZE_MATRIX_HPP_INCLUDED
00003 
00004 #include <boost/numpy.hpp>
00005 #include <Eigen/Core>
00006 
00007 namespace boost { namespace python {
00008 
00009 template <typename Base = default_call_policies>
00010 struct squeeze_matrix : Base {
00011     static PyObject * postcall(PyObject *, PyObject * result) {
00012         object r = object(handle<>(result));
00013         numpy::ndarray a(extract<numpy::ndarray>(r.attr("base")));
00014         if (a.get_nd() != 2) {
00015             PyErr_SetString(PyExc_ValueError, "squeeze_matrix requires a numpy.matrix return value");
00016             throw_error_already_set();
00017         }
00018         if (a.shape(0) == 1) {
00019             a = a.reshape(make_tuple(a.shape(1)));
00020         } else if (a.shape(1) == 1) {
00021             a = a.reshape(make_tuple(a.shape(0)));
00022         }
00023         Py_INCREF(a.ptr());
00024         return a.ptr();
00025     }
00026 };
00027 
00028 }} // namespace boost::python
00029 
00030 #endif // !BOOST_PYTHON_EIGEN_SQUEEZE_MATRIX_HPP_INCLUDED
